summary: This document is an email forwarding a message regarding the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein-related documentation, including a log book, a 583 packet in a six-part folder, a black binder, and a UPS envelope of documentation. The materials were provided by a Lieutenant who is out on OWCP (likely a workers' compensation program) and are to be given to an unspecified 'Ms.' by the Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

The Associate Warden of MCC New York is involved in handling Epstein-related documentation, likely due to Epstein's incarceration there.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein documentation transfer
events.description: An email is sent forwarding instructions to transfer a box containing four items of Jeffrey Epstein documentation to 'Ms.'

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Documentation related to Jeffrey Epstein was being transferred in September 2021, years after his death, indicating ongoing case management or investigations.
The documentation included a log book, a 583 packet in a six-part folder, a black binder, and a UPS envelope of documentation.
The materials were provided by a Lieutenant who was out on OWCP (likely workers' compensation), suggesting prior law enforcement or custodial involvement.
The transfer was coordinated through the Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein was previously held.
